text:
Our challenge was, how
do we get to be flexible, get to innovate

and allow other teams
that needed to develop new products?

How do we allow them to innovate
without being in their way?

We had account creations that were more
manual across different teams.

That took a long time,
so we looked into going all in on AWS orgs
to create our accounts, to apply policies centrally.

And so, we went from having two months to deliver
an account to about a day or two,

to get a fully featured set
that had policies for compliance, security

development, access, all automated
and delivered to our development teams.
We get to innovate with new products on AWS and services,

because our posture is set up for it and we
have our security telemetry that we wanted to have.
We leveraged key products within AWS.
We treat governance as an iterative process,
so that we stay engaged with our development teams.
That way, it's always a priority in our organization.

The most important thing,
being such a huge company,

we have centralized view
into our entire cloud posture.
